credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
title: Panel
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: ikat, cut solid cloth velvet
description: a: Panel [one of two with 1931-4-20-b], probably for wall hanging.  Ribbed cotton weft - warp of silk, chine technique - geometric design - borders and edges of red, white, brown, a little yellow and green - small diamond-shaped design in centre [striped red, white, brown and yellow] on field of deep blue - Arabic stamp on back.
name: Panel
